    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BasicUser
    The BasicUser class extends the User class and inherits all its fields and behavior.
    Invalid
    The Invalid class represents a failed validation result.
    PlatinumUser
    The PlatinumUser class extends the User class and inherits all its fields and behavior.
    PremiumUser
    The PremiumUser class extends the User class and inherits all its fields and behavior.
    User
    The User class represents a user with details such as username, email, password, and age.
    UserFactory
    The UserFactory class implements the Factory Method design pattern.
    UserUtils
    The UserUtils class provides utility methods for working with User objects.
    UserValidation
    The UserValidation interface defines a rule for checking if a User is valid.
    Valid
    The Valid class represents a successful validation result.
    ValidationResult
    The ValidationResult interface represents the result of a validation check.
